Ryan Mitchell

Weaving Design Excellence

Elevating Digital Design Horizons with Creative Pulse

Hi, I'm Ryan Mitchell, a 29-year-old UI Designer based in the vibrant city of Amsterdam. I've spent the last 5 years immersed in the world of digital product design, where creativity meets technical finesse to craft compelling and innovative solutions. Beyond the pixels, I find joy in capturing life's fleeting moments through photography. Whether I'm navigating the picturesque streets of Amsterdam on my trusty bike, pouring thoughts and reflections into my journal, or hitting the pavement for a rejuvenating run, my diverse set of hobbies mirrors the multidimensionality I bring to my design work.

May 2020 - Present

TECHINNOVATE SOLUTIONS

Senior UI
Designer

  • Led a dynamic design team in conceptualizing and executing user-centric interfaces for a range of cutting-edge digital products.

  • Played a pivotal role in enhancing the user experience across multiple platforms, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams.

Jan 2018 - Apr 2020

CREATIVEHUB AGENCY

UI/UX Consultant

  • Advised diverse clientele on optimizing their digital presence through strategic UI/UX solutions.

  • Successfully translated client visions into compelling design concepts, fostering brand identity and engagement.

  • Conducted user research and usability testing to refine products.

Oct 2016 - Dec 2017

PIXELCRAFT STUDIOS

Junior UI
Designer

  • Started my career contributing to the design and development of visually stunning websites and mobile applications.

  • Gained hands-on experience in the entire design process, from concept creation to final implementation.

  • Collaborated with senior designers to refine skills and deliver high-quality design solutions.
